42 enum class MediaPlayerStatus {
50  SUCCESS,
51 
59  PENDING,
60 
68  FAILURE
69 };

88 public:
96  virtual ~MediaPlayerInterface() = default;
97

116

154 
166  virtual MediaPlayerStatus setOffset(std::chrono::milliseconds offset) {
167  return MediaPlayerStatus::FAILURE;
168  }
169 
187  virtual MediaPlayerStatus play() = 0;

206  virtual MediaPlayerStatus stop() = 0;
207

250 
269  virtual MediaPlayerStatus seekTo(std::chrono::milliseconds offsetInMilliseconds) {
270  return MediaPlayerStatus::FAILURE;
271  };
272

283  return false;
284  };
